name: RedEyes 赤瞳之勋
description: ~ 一款精美的JRPG游戏，全手绘地图，kawaii的像素人物，炫酷的特效，精彩悠长的剧情，多元化战斗系统，回合制战斗，弹幕模式，arpg战斗和解密任务，开启你新世界的大门吧 ~
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: 4 GHz dual core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: 4 GHz dual core or 8 GHz dual core Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 4GB memory recommended DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 8 GB available space
